   <script>
    var digitalData = { };

         if (urlSegments[i] == "" || urlSegments[i] == "index.php") {continue;} else {
         pageName += ":"+urlSegments[i];
         if (digitalData.page.category.pageType.length < 1 && i == 1) {
         digitalData.page.category.pageType = urlSegments[i];
         }
         }
 }
 digitalData.product = {};
 digitalData.page.pageInfo.pageName = pageName;

     <div class="audience-all video-slide first-slide slide-wrapper flex flex-align-center" style="background-image:url(https://res.cloudinary.com/nycgo/image/fetch/q_65,c_fill,f_auto,w_1920/https://www.nycgo.com/images/uploads/homepage/Homepage_Update/Chrysler-Building-Slide0-1500x1000.jpg)">
      <div class="slide-content">
       <img alt="introducing famous original new york city" class="img-responsive" src="https://res.cloudinary.com/nycgo/image/fetch/q_65,c_fill,f_auto,w_768/https://www.nycgo.com/assets/images/homepage/famous-original/introducing-famous-original-hp.png"/>

     <div class="audience-local slide-wrapper flex justify-content-center align-items-end align-items-center-xs zoom-out Famous Original New York City">
      <div class="bg-image" style="background-image:url(https://res.cloudinary.com/nycgo/image/fetch/q_65,c_fill,f_auto,w_1920/https://www.nycgo.com/images/uploads/Mastead_02.jpg)">
      </div>
      <div class="slide-content col-xs-12 col-sm-7 col-sm-pull-1 col-md-7 col-md-pull-2 col-lg-5 col-lg-pull-3">
       <a href="/famous-original-nyc">
        <h1>
         Famous Original New York City
        </h1>
       </a>
       <p>
       </p>
       <p>
        In NYC, what you see is what you get. This town celebrates hustle and heart, and the stories it inspires are souvenirs for the genuine, spontaneous, spirited and proud.
       </p>
       <div class="padding-multiline">
        <a class="btn btn-default btn-prominent" data-section="Famous Original New York City" href="/famous-original-nyc">
         Discover True York
        </a>
       </div>

           of five boroughs

            <div class="borough-slide">
             <h2>
              The Bronx
             </h2>
             <p>
             </p>
             <p>
              People all around the world know the Bronx as the home of the New York Yankees, the Bronx Zoo and the New York Botanical Gardenânot to mention as the birthplace of hip-hop.
             </p>
             <div>
              <a class="btn btn-default btn-prominent btn-learn-more" data-section="The Bronx" href="/boroughs-neighborhoods/the-bronx">
               Learn more
              </a>

              </a>
             </div>

            <div class="borough-slide">
             <h2>
              Brooklyn
             </h2>
             <p>
             </p>
             <p>
              No matter how hip it looks on TV, NYC's most populous borough is best experienced in person. Read on to find out about live music, Prospect Park, Nets basketball and more.
             </p>
             <div>
              <a class="btn btn-default btn-prominent btn-learn-more" data-section="Brooklyn" href="/boroughs-neighborhoods/brooklyn">

             <h2>
              Manhattan
             </h2>
             <p>
             </p>
             <p>
              When people think of New York City, Manhattan is often the first place they picture.Â Manhattan contains charming neighborhoods and hidden green spaces, trendy boutiques and classic bars. Read on and explore.
             </p>
             <div>

             </h2>
             <p>

             <p>

              Visitors shouldnât miss the opportunity to explore Staten Island, renowned for its museums, historic landmarks, beaches and parklandâincluding the Cityâs largest forest preserve in the Staten Island Greenbelt.

            </svg>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div class="audience-domestic slide-wrapper flex justify-content-center align-items-end align-items-center-xs zoom-out Famous Original New York City">
      <div class="bg-image" style="background-image:url(https://res.cloudinary.com/nycgo/image/fetch/q_65,c_fill,f_auto,w_1920/https://www.nycgo.com/images/uploads/Mastead_02.jpg)">
      </div>
      <div class="slide-content col-xs-12 col-sm-7 col-sm-pull-1 col-md-7 col-md-pull-2 col-lg-5 col-lg-pull-3">
       <a href="/discover-famous-original-nyc">
        <h1>
         Famous Original New York City
        </h1>
       </a>
       <p>
       </p>
       <p>
        In NYC, what you see is what you get. This town celebrates hustle and heart, and the stories it inspires are souvenirs for the genuine, spontaneous, spirited and proud.
       </p>
       <div class="padding-multiline">
        <a class="btn btn-default btn-prominent" data-section="Famous Original New York City" href="/discover-famous-original-nyc">
         Discover True York
        </a>
       </div>
      </div>

     <div class="audience-domestic slide-wrapper flex justify-content-center align-items-end align-items-center-xs zoom-out The Boroughs">

      </div>
      <div class="slide-content col-xs-12 col-sm-7 col-sm-pull-1 col-md-7 col-md-pull-2 col-lg-5 col-lg-pull-3">
       <div class="container home-block explore-block" id="explore-block">
        <div class="explore-bg b-lazy" data-src="https://res.cloudinary.com/nycgo/image/fetch/q_65,c_fill,f_auto,w_1920/https://www.nycgo.com

         <div class="inner-bg">
         </div>
        </div>
        <div class="borough-wrapper flex">
         <div class="left">
          <div class="h1 hidden-xs">
           NYC is made up
           <br/>
           of five boroughs
          </div>
          <div class="borough-column row">
           <div class="borough-slide-wrapper hidden-xs">
            <div class="borough-slide">
             <ul class="list-unstyled" data-lpos="Boroughs">
              <li class="h2">
               <a class="borough-link" data-count="1" data-image="https://res.cloudinary.com/nycgo/image/fetch/q_65,c_fill,f_auto,w_1920/https://www.nycgo.com/images/uploads/bronx.jpg" data-map="borough_bronx" href="/boroughs-neighborhoods/the-bronx" title="The Bronx">
                The Bronx
               </a>
              </li>
              <li class="h2">
               <a class="borough-link" data-count="2" data-image="https://res.cloudinary.com/nycgo/image/fetch/q_65,c_fill,f_auto,w_1920/https://www.nycgo.com/images/uploads/brooklyn.jpg" data-map="borough_brooklyn" href="/boroughs-neighborhoods/brooklyn" title="Brooklyn">
                Brooklyn
               </a>
              </li>
              <li class="h2">
               <a class="borough-link" data-count="3" data-image="https://res.cloudinary.com/nycgo/image/fetch/q_65,c_fill,f_auto,w_1920/https://www.nycgo.com/images/uploads/manhattan.jpg" data-map="borough_manhattan" href="/boroughs-neighborhoods/manhattan" title="Manhattan">
                Manhattan
               </a>
              </li>
              <li class="h2">
               <a class="borough-link" data-count="4" data-image="https://res.cloudinary.com/nycgo/image/fetch/q_65,c_fill,f_auto,w_1920/https://www.nycgo.com/images/uploads/queens.jpg" data-map="borough_queens" href="/boroughs-neighborhoods/queens" title="Queens">
                Queens
               </a>
              </li>
              <li class="h2">
               <a class="borough-link" data-count="5" data-image="https://res.cloudinary.com/nycgo/image/fetch/q_65,c_fill,f_auto,w_1920/https://www.nycgo.com/images/uploads/staten_island.jpg" data-map="borough_staten_island" href="/boroughs-neighborhoods/staten-island" title="Staten Island">
                Staten Island
               </a>
              </li>
             </ul>
            </div>
            <div class="borough-slide">
             <h2>
              The Bronx
             </h2>
             <p>
             </p>
             <p>
              People all around the world know the Bronx as the home of the New York Yankees, the Bronx Zoo and the New York Botanical Gardenânot to mention as the birthplace of hip-hop.
             </p>
             <div>
              <a class="btn btn-default btn-prominent btn-learn-more" data-section="The Bronx" href="/boroughs-neighborhoods/the-bronx">
               Learn more
              </a>
             </div>
             <div class="padding-multiline">
              <a class="back-to-map">
               <i class="icon icon-arrow-left">
               </i>
               back to map
              </a>
             </div>
            </div>
            <div class="borough-slide">
             <h2>
              Brooklyn
             </h2>
             <p>
             </p>
             <p>
              No matter how hip it looks on TV, NYC's most populous borough is best experienced in person. Read on to find out about live music, Prospect Park, Nets basketball and more.
             </p>
             <div>
              <a class="btn btn-default btn-prominent btn-learn-more" data-section="Brooklyn" href="/boroughs-neighborhoods/brooklyn">
               Learn more
              </a>
             </div>
             <div class="padding-multiline">
              <a class="back-to-map">

               </i>
               back to map
              </a>
             </div>
            </div>
            <div class="borough-slide">
             <h2>
              Manhattan
             </h2>
             <p>
             </p>
             <p>
              When people think of New York City, Manhattan is often the first place they picture.Â Manhattan contains charming neighborhoods and hidden green spaces, trendy boutiques and classic bars. Read on and explore.
             </p>
             <div>
              <a class="btn btn-default btn-prominent btn-learn-more" data-section="Manhattan" href="/boroughs-neighborhoods/manhattan">

              </a>

              <a class="back-to-map">
               <i class="icon icon-arrow-left">
               </i>
               back to map
              </a>
             </div>
            </div>
            <div class="borough-slide">
             <h2>
              Queens
             </h2>
             <p>
             </p>
             <p>
              WithÂ adventurous art, international cuisine, gorgeous parks and world-class sporting events, Queens features attractions to satisfy nearly every taste.
             </p>
             <div>
              <a class="btn btn-default btn-prominent btn-learn-more" data-section="Queens" href="/boroughs-neighborhoods/queens">

            <div class="borough-slide">
             <h2>
              Staten Island
             </h2>
             <p>
             </p>
             <p>
              Visitors shouldnât miss the opportunity to explore Staten Island, renowned for its museums, historic landmarks, beaches and parklandâincluding the Cityâs largest forest preserve in the Staten Island Greenbelt.
             </p>
             <div>
              <a class="btn btn-default btn-prominent btn-learn-more" data-section="Staten Island" href="/boroughs-neighborhoods/staten-island">

      <div class="bg-image" style="background-image:url(https://res.cloudinary.com/nycgo/image/fetch/q_65,c_fill,f_auto,w_1920/https://www.nycgo.com/images/uploads/Mastead_02.jpg)">
      </div>
      <div class="slide-content col-xs-12 col-sm-7 col-sm-pull-1 col-md-7 col-md-pull-2 col-lg-5 col-lg-pull-3">

        <h1>
         Famous Original New York City
        </h1>
       </a>
       <p>
       </p>
       <p>
        In NYC, what you see is what you get. This town celebrates hustle and heart, and the stories it inspires are souvenirs for the genuine, spontaneous, spirited and proud.
       </p>

        <a class="btn btn-default btn-prominent" data-section="Famous Original New York City" href="/discover-famous-original-nyc">

         <div class="left">

           <br/>
           of five boroughs

            <div class="borough-slide">
             <h2>
              The Bronx
             </h2>
             <p>
             </p>
             <p>
              People all around the world know the Bronx as the home of the New York Yankees, the Bronx Zoo and the New York Botanical Gardenânot to mention as the birthplace of hip-hop.
             </p>
             <div>
              <a class="btn btn-default btn-prominent btn-learn-more" data-section="The Bronx" href="/boroughs-neighborhoods/the-bronx">

              Brooklyn
             </h2>
             <p>
             </p>

     <div class="audience-local slide-wrapper-nav" style="background-image:url(https://res.cloudinary.com/nycgo/image/fetch/q_65,c_fill,f_auto,w_480/https://www.nycgo.com/images/uploads/Family-Paw-Patrol-Hero-Preview.jpg)">
      <h3>
       Family-Friendly NYC
      </h3>
     </div>
     <div class="audience-local slide-wrapper-nav" style="background-image:url(https://res.cloudinary.com/nycgo/image/fetch/q_65,c_fill,f_auto,w_480/https://www.nycgo.com/images/uploads/homepage/cyclone-Brooklyn-NYC-BamiAdedoyin-66.jpg)">
      <h3>
       Summer Events
      </h3>
     </div>
     <div class="audience-local slide-wrapper-nav" style="background-image:url(https://res.cloudinary.com/nycgo/image/fetch/q_65,c_fill,f_auto,w_480/https://www.nycgo.com/images/uploads/homepage/Homepage_Update/Boroughs-Brooklyn-Bridge-Park-Julienne-Schaer-019-400x100.jpg)">
      <h3>
       The Boroughs
      </h3>
     </div>
     <div class="audience-domestic slide-wrapper-nav" style="background-image:url(https://res.cloudinary.com/nycgo/image/fetch/q_65,c_fill,f_auto,w_480/https://www.nycgo.com/images/uploads/homepage/Homepage_Update/TYC_400x100.jpg)">

    <section class="explore-the-city" id="explore-the-city" title="Explore the City">
     <h3>
      Explore the City
     </h3>
     <div class="row">
      <div class="col-xs-6 col-sm-3">
       <div class="square b-lazy" data-src="https://res.cloudinary.com/nycgo/image/fetch/q_65,c_fill,f_auto,w_300,h_300/https://www.nycgo.com/images/uploads/homepage/TheMetFifthAve-upper-east-side-Manhattan-NYC-KateGlicksberg_0076_copy.jpg">
        <a class="square-inn text-center" data-lid="Museums &amp; Galleries | Slot 1" href="/things-to-do/museums-galleries">
         <div class="slide-up">
          <div class="caption-title">
           <i class="icon icon-museum icon-3x">
           </i>
           <h4>
            Museums &amp; Galleries
           </h4>
          </div>
          <div class="caption">
           <p>
            Immerse yourself in art, science, history and pop culture at NYC's spectacular institutions.
           </p>
          </div>
         </div>
        </a>
       </div>
      </div>
      <div class="col-xs-6 col-sm-3">
       <div class="square b-lazy" data-src="https://res.cloudinary.com/nycgo/image/fetch/q_65,c_fill,f_auto,w_300,h_300/https://www.nycgo.com/images/uploads/homepage/Homepage_Update/Coney-Island-Brooklyn-NYC-Brittany-Petronells-DSC_5174.jpg">
        <a class="square-inn text-center" data-lid="Attractions | Slot 2" href="/things-to-do/attractions">
         <div class="slide-up">
          <div class="caption-title">
           <i class="icon icon-camera icon-3x">
           </i>
           <h4>
            Attractions
           </h4>
          </div>
          <div class="caption">
           <p>
            Discover grand skyscrapers, lush parks and historic landmarks with our guide to NYC's best attractions.
           </p>
          </div>
         </div>
        </a>
       </div>
      </div>
      <div class="col-xs-6 col-sm-3">
       <div class="square b-lazy" data-src="https://res.cloudinary.com/nycgo/image/fetch/q_65,c_fill,f_auto,w_300,h_300/https://www.nycgo.com/images/uploads/homepage/Homepage_Update/broadway-lights-Manhattan-NYC-walter-wlodarczyk-2017-06-28-87A6012_2.jpg">
        <a class="square-inn text-center" data-lid="Broadway | Slot 3" href="/broadway">
         <div class="slide-up">
          <div class="caption-title">
           <i class="icon icon-tickets-o icon-3x">
           </i>
           <h4>
            Broadway
           </h4>
          </div>
          <div class="caption">
           <p>
            See dramatic plays, bold musicals and long-running hits in the City's iconicÂ Theatre District.
           </p>
          </div>
         </div>
        </a>
       </div>
      </div>
      <div class="col-xs-6 col-sm-3">
       <div class="square b-lazy" data-src="https://res.cloudinary.com/nycgo/image/fetch/q_65,c_fill,f_auto,w_300,h_300/https://www.nycgo.com/images/uploads/homepage/Homepage_Update/Cherry-Izakaya-Williamsburg-Brooklyn-NYC-Tagger-Yancey-IV_1304.jpg">
        <a class="square-inn text-center" data-lid="Restaurants | Slot 4" href="/things-to-do/restaurants-dining">
         <div class="slide-up">
          <div class="caption-title">
           <i class="icon icon-dining icon-3x">
           </i>
           <h4>
            Restaurants
           </h4>
          </div>
          <div class="caption">
           <p>
            Thousands of eateries serve food from every corner of the globe, plus NYC classics like bagels and pizza.
           </p>
          </div>
         </div>
        </a>
       </div>
      </div>
      <div class="col-xs-6 col-sm-3">
       <div class="square b-lazy" data-src="https://res.cloudinary.com/nycgo/image/fetch/q_65,c_fill,f_auto,w_300,h_300/https://www.nycgo.com/images/uploads/homepage/Homepage_Update/Macys-Fireworks-Brooklyn-Bridge-Park-Brooklyn-NYC-JulienneSchaer-009.jpg">
        <a class="square-inn text-center" data-lid="Events | Slot 5" href="/things-to-do/events-in-nyc">

           </h4>
          </div>
          <div class="caption">
           <p>
            Find fun things to do in NYCâincluding the City's most famous parades, festivals and concerts.
           </p>
          </div>
         </div>
        </a>
       </div>
      </div>
      <div class="col-xs-6 col-sm-3">
       <div class="square b-lazy" data-src="https://res.cloudinary.com/nycgo/image/fetch/q_65,c_fill,f_auto,w_300,h_300/https://www.nycgo.com/images/uploads/homepage/Homepage_Update/shopping-Soho-Manhattan-NYC-TaggerYanceyIV.jpg">

      </div>
      <div class="col-xs-6 col-sm-3">
       <div class="square b-lazy" data-src="https://res.cloudinary.com/nycgo/image/fetch/q_65,c_fill,f_auto,w_300,h_300/https://www.nycgo.com/images/uploads/homepage/Homepage_Update/Staten-Island-Yankees-St-Geogre-Staten-Island-NYC-Julienne-Schaervertical_01_web__x_large.jpg">

       googletag.cmd.push(function() {
         var widthLg = 1185;
         var widthSm = 753;
         var widthMd = 977;
         var mapSlot = googletag.sizeMapping().
         addSize([0, 0], [300, 250]).
         addSize([widthMd, 0], [[970, 90], [970, 250]]).
         build();
         if (mapSlot[0][1][0] !== undefined) {
         width
         = mapSlot[0][1][0];
         height = mapSlot[0][1][1];
         } else {
         width
         = mapSlot[1][1][0];
         height = mapSlot[1][1][1];
         }
         gptReadySlots.push({ 'id' : 'gpt-unit-middle', 'lazy' : true, 'slot' :
         googletag.defineSlot('/61567524/nycgo.com/Homepage', [width, height], 'gpt-unit-middle').defineSizeMapping(mapSlot).addService(googletag.pubads())
         .setTargeting('size','300x250-xs-sm-970x250-md-lg')
         .setTargeting('pos', 'gpt-unit-middle')
         .setTargeting('url', window.location.pathname)
         });
 });
         function closeMobileSticky() {
         $(".adspace.mobile-sticky-container").removeClass("visible-xs").addClass("hidden");
         var date = new Date();
         var expiry = new Date(date.setDate(date.getDate() + 1));
         document.cookie = "closedMobileSticky=true; expires=" + expiry;
         }
      </script>

    <section class="plan-ahead" data-staticsection="true" id="plan-ahead" title="Plan Ahead">
     <h3>
      Plan Ahead
     </h3>
     <div class="clearfix gray-boxes">
      <div class="col-xs-6 col-sm-3">
       <a class="text-center" data-lid="Maps &amp; Guides | Slot  " href="/maps-guides">
        <i class="icon icon-compass">
        </i>
        <h4>
         Maps &amp; Guides
        </h4>
       </a>
      </div>
      <div class="col-xs-6 col-sm-3">
       <a class="text-center" data-lid="Attraction Passes | Slot  " href="/things-to-do/tours-in-nyc/attraction-passes">
        <i class="icon icon-camera">
        </i>
        <h4>
         Attraction Passes
        </h4>
       </a>
      </div>
      <div class="col-xs-6 col-sm-3">
       <a class="text-center" data-lid="Tickets &amp; Deals | Slot  " href="/plan-your-trip/tickets-deals">
        <i class="icon icon-tickets-angle">
        </i>
        <h4>
         Tickets &amp; Deals
        </h4>
       </a>
      </div>
      <div class="col-xs-6 col-sm-3">

    <section class="see-your-city" id="see-your-city" title="SeeYourCity">
     <h3>
      #SeeYourCity
     </h3>
     <div class="row">
      <script async="" data-chute-component-display-wall="https://s3.amazonaws.com/store.getchute.com/5a90215a4ea9730268000043" src="https://static.getchute.com/display-runners/component-display-wall/component-display-wall.js">
      </script>
      <img src="https://pixel.getchute.com/?dID=5a90215a4ea9730268000043&amp;cID=2786&amp;eTp=view_served" style="width:0; height: 0"/>
     </div>
    </section>

   </div>
   <script type="text/javascript">
    googletag.cmd.push(function() {
         gptReadySlots.push({ 'id' : 'gpt-unit-interstitial', 'lazy' : false, 'slot' :
         googletag.defineOutOfPageSlot('/61567524/nycgo.com/ProgramInterstitial',
         'gpt-unit-interstitial').addService(googletag.pubads())
         .setTargeting('size','oop')
         .setTargeting('pos', 'gpt-unit-interstitial')
         .setTargeting('url', window.location.pathname)
         .setTargeting('entry','{entry_id}')
         .setTargeting('categories', [
         ])
         });
 });
         function closeMobileSticky() {
         $(".adspace.mobile-sticky-container").removeClass("visible-xs").addClass("hidden");
         var date = new Date();
         var expiry = new Date(date.setDate(date.getDate() + 1));
         document.cookie = "closedMobileSticky=true; expires=" + expiry;
         }
   </script>

   <script src="/assets/js/assets.min.js?v=1525376526">
   </script>
   <script src="/assets/js/global.min.js?v=1527103476">
   </script>
   <script>
    googletag.cmd.push(function() {
         googletag.enableServices();
         gptTemp = [];
         gptReadySlots.forEach(function(e) {
         gptSlotDivs.push(e.id);
         if (e.lazy == false || isElementInViewport($('#' + e.id))) {gptRefreshSlots.push(e.slot);} else {gptTemp.push(e);}
         });
         gptReadySlots = gptTemp;
         googletag.display.apply(this, gptSlotDivs);
         googletag.pubads().refresh(gptRefreshSlots);
         });
         var iWidth = $(window).width();
         var iHeight = $(window).height();
         var gptTimer;
         $(window).resize(function() {
         clearTimeout(gptTimer);
         gptTimer = setTimeout(function() {
         if ($(window).width() != iWidth && $(window).height() != iHeight) {
         iWidth = $(window).width();
         iHeight = $(window).height();
         googletag.cmd.push(function() {googletag.pubads().refresh(gptRefreshSlots);});
         }
         }, 250);
         });
         $(window).scroll(function(){
         clearTimeout(gptTimer);
         gptTimer = setTimeout(function() {
         gptTemp = [];
         gptReadySlots.forEach(function(e) {
         if (isElementInViewport($('#' + e.id))) {
         gptRefreshSlots.push(e.slot);
         googletag.cmd.push(function() {googletag.pubads().refresh([e.slot]);});
         } else {gptTemp.push(e);}
         });
         gptReadySlots = gptTemp;
         }, 250);
         });
         function isElementInViewport (el) {
         if (typeof jQuery === "function" && el instanceof jQuery) {
         el = el[0];
         }
         var rect = el.getBoundingClientRect();
         return (
         rect.top >= 0 &&
         rect.left >= 0 &&
         rect.bottom <= (window.innerHeight || document.documentElement.clientHeight) &&
         rect.right <= (window.innerWidth || document.documentElement.clientWidth)
         );
         }
   </script>

   </script>

   <script>
    (function(i,s,o,g,r,a,m){i['GoogleAnalyticsObject']=r;i[r]=i[r]||function(){
         (i[r].q=i[r].q||[]).push(arguments)},i[r].l=1*new Date();a=s.createElement(o),
         m=s.getElementsByTagName(o)[0];a.async=1;a.src=g;m.parentNode.insertBefore(a,m)
         })(window,document,'script','//www.google-analytics.com/analytics.js','ga');
         // Creates an adblock detection plugin.
         ga('provide', 'adblockTracker', function(tracker, opts) {
         var ad = document.createElement('ins');
         ad.className = 'AdSense';
         ad.style.display = 'block';
         ad.style.position = 'absolute';
         ad.style.top = '-1px';
         ad.style.height = '1px';
         document.body.appendChild(ad);
         tracker.set('dimension' + opts.dimensionIndex, !ad.clientHeight);
         document.body.removeChild(ad);
         });
         ga('create', 'UA-35788498-1', 'auto');
         ga('require', 'adblockTracker', {dimensionIndex: 1});
         ga('send', 'pageview');
   </script>

   <script type="text/javascript">
    var _sf_async_config={uid:115,domain:"nycgo.com",useCanonical:true};
         (function(){
         function loadChartbeat() {
         window._sf_endpt=(new Date()).getTime();
         var e = document.createElement('script');
         e.setAttribute('language', 'javascript');
         e.setAttribute('type', 'text/javascript');
         e.setAttribute('src', '//static.chartbeat.com/js/chartbeat.js');
         document.body.appendChild(e);
         }
         var oldonload = window.onload;
         window.onload = (typeof window.onload != 'function') ?
         loadChartbeat : function() { oldonload(); loadChartbeat(); };
         })();
   </script>
  </body>
